Locale.description: Represents a complete translation for Wordplay, including every user interface label, every description, etc. All of these fields must be included in order for a translation to be complete.

$schema.description: A path to the generated JSON schema that mirrors this type, for validation and auto-complete

invalid.description: When the URL is not valid

noConnection.description: There was no connection to the internet

unvailable.description: The URL could not be accessed

newProject.description: The default Program for a new project

BinaryEvaluate.description: Description $1: the operator Start $1: left expression Finish $1: result

Bind.description: Description $1: name bound Start $1: bind evaluating Finish $1: resulting value $2: names bound

DuplicateName.description: $1: The name that shadowed this one

Block.description: Description $1: # of statements Start No inputs Finish $1: Resulting value

BooleanLiteral.description: Description $1: true if true, false otherwise

Conditional.description: Start $1: condition to check Finish $1: resulting value

afterthen.description: $1: true if jumping to the "else" expression

Convert.description: Start $1: expression to convert Finish $1: resulting value

Delete.description: Start $1: table expression Finish $1: resulting value

Evaluate.description: Descriptionn $1: name of function being evaluated Start no inputs Finish $1: resulting value

MissingInput.description: $1: Missing input $2: Evaluate that is missing input

UnexpectedInput.description: $1: Evaluate with unexected input $2: Unexpected input

evaluate.description: What to say after inputs are done evaluating, right before starting evaluation the function

FunctionException.description: $1: Expression that didn't produce a function $2: Scope not found in, or undefined

Insert.description: Start $1: table expression Finish $1: resulting value

Is.description: Description $1: The type being checked for Start $1: expression Finish $1: result $2: type

ListLiteral.description: Description $1: item count Finish $1: resulting value

MapType.description: Description $1: Key type or undefined $2: Map type or undefined

Mention.description: Description $1: the name or number mentioned

Paragraph.description: Description $1: number $1: unit Start $1: the node

Previous.description: Start $1: the stream expression being checked Finish $1: resulting value

Program.description: Start $1: a stream that changed Finish $1: resulting value

EvaluationLimitException.description: $1: The function that was evaluated too many times

PropertyBind.description: Description $1: the name being refined Finish $1: revised property $2: revised value

Reference.description: Description $1: the name Start $1: the name being resolved

NameException.description: $1: Scope in which name was not found

TableLiteral.description: Description $1: the number of rows Finish $1: resulting table

UnaryEvaluate.description: Description $1: the operator Finish $1: resulting value

UnknownNameType.description: Description $1: Name that's not known or undefined

UnparsableConflict.description: $1: True if expression, false if type

Update.description: Start $1: the table Finish $1: resulting value

description.description: non-optional text, optional name, optional size, optional font, then non-optional pose
all optional inputs: opacity, rotation, scale, flipx, flipy
$1 total count $2 phrase count $3 group count
$1 total count $2 phrase count $3 group count
$1: total outputs, $2: total phrases, $3: total groups, $4: pose

rules.description: Content moderation rules that creators promise to follow’

changed.description: How to describe output that has changed

entered.description: How to describe output that has entered for the first time

moved.description: How to describe output that has moved

start.description: What to call the main source in a project.

conflicts.description: The conflicts area at the bottom of the editor.

label.description: The ARIA label for the conflicts section in the editor.

help.description: How to request help with localization

selected.description: How to label the locales that have been selected

supported.description: How to label the supported locales that have not been selected

submit.description: Description for the email submission button.

unknown.description: When someone tries to add an email collaborator that doesn't have a Wordplay account

email.description: The email address of the collaborator being added

public.description: The private and public mode descriptions

back.description: The back button in the docs tile

home.description: The home button in the docs tile

conversions.description: Documentation header in structure before conversions

functions.description: Documentation header in structure before functions

inputs.description: Documentation header in structure and functions before inputs

interfaces.description: Documentation header in structure view before interfaces

properties.description: Documentation header in structure before properties

label.description: The ARIA label for the palette section.

learn.description: A link to the tutorial for a concept

link.description: A link to a concept in documentation

nodoc.description: Shown if documentation is missing for a concept

edit.description: Descriptions of cursor positions and code transformations

before.description: A way to say "before [token], at the beginning of the program"

bind.description: Shown in menus to offer to name an expression with a bind

conflicts.description: A description of how many conflicts are at this position

line.description: A way to say "empty line between [node1] and [node2]"

node.description: A way to say "on node of type [type]"

unwrap.description: Shown in menus to offer to unwrap an expression in parentheses

wrap.description: Shown in menus to offer to wrap an expression in parentheses

key.description: The text field that accepts key, placement, and chat input when a key stream is active

label.description: The ARIA label for the output section

fit.description: Toggle whether output is fit to window

header.description: How to describe galleries of projects

call.description: What function says as a call to action

about.description: What content is on the about page

galleries.description: What content is on the galleries page

learn.description: What content is on the learn page

projects.description: What content is on the projects page

rights.description: What content is on the rights page

next.description: Advance to the next pause in the dialog

previous.description: Navigate back to the previous pause in the dialog

error.description: When the tutorial could not be found

header.description: The header for the tutorial page

anonymous.description: Shown in the footer a creator is not logged in.

email.description: Shown when the email address isn't valid

expired.description: Shown when the login link expired

invalid.description: Shown when the login link isn't valid

offline.description: When there's no connection to Firebase

unchanged.description: When the email addres couldn't be changed for unknown reasons.

header.description: Header for the login page when not logged in

change.description: Tells the creator that they can change their email address.

confirm.description: Prompts creator to check their original email to confirm the email change

enter.description: Asks the creator to enter their email if they opened the email link in a different browser.

login.description: Prompts creator to login to save their work

logout.description: Offers to log out the creator.

play.description: Encouragement to go create after logging in.

reallyDelete.description: Offers to really delete account forever

sent.description: Prompt to check email for a login link.

success.description: Shown briefly before page redirects to projects

projects.description: The project creation and browsing page

consequences.description: The consequences of violating a promise.

header.description: The header for the unknown route

message.description: The message for the unknown route

addGroup.description: Add a group to the output

addPhrase.description: Add a phrase to the output

createGroup.description: The button that creates a group when there is none

createPhrase.description: The button that creates a phrase when there is none

createStage.description: The button that creates a stage when there is none

revert.description: Resets a property to it's default value

sequence.description: Convert a pose to a sequence

set.description: Sets the property to a value, allowing modification

label.description: The ARIA label for the palette section

computed.description: Shown in the output palette when the output(s) selected have expressions that are not editable using the editor.

default.description: Shown in the output palette when the output(s) selected have no value set, but have a default

inherited.description: Shown in the output palette when a value is unset but is inherited

mixed.description: Shown in the output palette when multiple outputs are selected but they have unequal values.

notContent.description: Shown in the output palette when a list of content is isn't valid

notSequence.description: Shown in the output palette when a sequence isn't valid

editing.description: The text prompting the creator to edit the selected output

offerGroup.description: The text offering to create a group in the palette without a stage

offerPhrase.description: The text offering to create a phrase in the palette without a stage

offerStage.description: The text offering to create a stage in the palette without a stage

pauseToEdit.description: The text offering to pause the project to allow palette editing

welcome.description: Placeholder text used in code examples.

copy.description: Copy the project as text to the clipboard

focusCycle.description: Keyboard shortcut to cycle between tiles

focusDocs.description: Keyboard shortcut to focus documentation tile

focusOutput.description: Keyboard shortcut to focus output tile

focusPalette.description: Keyboard shortcut to focus palette tiles

focusSource.description: Keyboard shortcut to focus source tiles

removeCollaborator.description: Remove a collaborator that has been shared with

error.description: The error shown when a project ID is unknown.

help.description: The keyboard shortcut to show the shortcut menu

local.description: Shown when saving on device was successful

saved.description: Shown when online saving was successful

unsaved.description: Shown when there was a problem saving

expandSequence.description: The button shown when a list of code is ellided; clicking it shows the hidden code.

selectOutput.description: Output preview button for selecting output for display in output tile

delete.description: The confirm button that deletes a source file

copy.description: Copy selection to clipboard as text

cut.description: Cut selection to clipboard as text

decrementLiteral.description: Decrement the literal at the cursor

incrementLiteral.description: Increment the literal at the cursor

nextInline.description: Move cursor inline one position after

nextLine.description: Move caret to the line after

priorInline.description: Move cursor inline one position before

priorLine.description: Move caret to the line before

empty.description: The text to show when a source file is empty

label.description: The ARIA label for the source file section

back.description: How to describe the autocomplete back button for leaving the submenu

label.description: How to describe the autocomplete menu

show.description: The menu show button and keyboard shortcut

overwritten.description: When some other device had a more recent edit that overrode this device's version.

unparsable.description: The placeholder string indicating that a template string could not be parsed

unwritten.description: The placeholder indicating that a locale string is not yet written

tile.description: Controls for the tiled windows in the project

fullscreen.description: Enter and exit tile fullscreen mode

timeline.description: The timeline view below the output

backNode.description: Step to the previous evaluation of the node at the cursor

forwardNode.description: Step to the next evaluation of the node at the cursor

out.description: Step out of the current function evaluation

reset.description: Reset the input history to restart the performance

label.description: The ARIA label for the timeline section

slider.description: The description of the timeline slider

widget.description: Generic reusable widgets and their generic labels.

cancel.description: The 'x' cancel button after a confirm button has been pressed.

close.description: The close button on modal dialogs

loading.description: The page loading widget, before content is shown

message.description: The message shown in the page loading feedback
